name: Splash (itch) (MrLeaky)
description:
Name undecided yet. :) Submarine... Splash... not sure.

Note that this is just a very short demo/prototype. Looks better on mobile and desktop (WebGL seems to hate vector sprites?), but graphics is obviously unfinished, and the sub and terrain are pretty much placeholders.

Control is just tap/click. And yes, it's supposed to be somewhat annoyingly difficult.
